name: The New Hire
description:
You finally got an office job to make your parents proud. It's definitely not your dream job - but whatever pays the bills... right?


'The New Hire' was created by Ajackster in 1 week for a YouTube challenge.

Playtime: 5 - 10 Minute playtime

Controls: WASD movement, LMB interact

If you enjoyed this video, check out my YouTube channel to see future projects I work on!
